meta.title: LeadImmo | Find your next property in Koh Samui
meta.description: Landing page and AI-assisted blog to create serious buyer leads for Koh Samui real estate.

hero.title: Unlock Koh Samui real estate opportunities
hero.subtitle: Tailored property scouting, financing support and relocation insights backed by data.

leadForm.title: Tell us about your project
leadForm.description: Complete the form and our senior advisor replies within 24 hours.
leadForm.consent: I agree to be contacted and confirm I have read the privacy notice.

why.title: Why invest in Koh Samui with LeadImmo
points: On-the-ground advisors with 15+ years of transaction experience.
AI market models to benchmark rental yields and resale potential.
Verified partner network: legal, architecture, property management.

metrics.label: Qualified buyers connected to developers in 2023
Average occupancy secured for managed villas
Time to first offer after mandate

items.quote: LeadImmo coordinated the legal, banking and villa renovation so we could focus on launching our rental brand.
items.author: Marie & Thibault - Paris to Samui

items.quote: Their weekly AI snapshot compared dozens of listings and highlighted the yield leader instantly.
items.author: Jasmine K. - Singapore

items.question: Can you assist foreign buyers with company setup?
items.answer: Yes, we liaise with vetted law firms to structure the purchase, including Thai company incorporation when required.

items.question: Do you only work on luxury villas?
items.answer: Our advisors cover villas, boutique hotels and prime land. Tell us about your strategy and we match the right expert.

items.question: How does the AI blog help my decision?
items.answer: Each article combines live market data, curated keywords and human review to surface the best opportunities fast.

thankYou.title: Thank you for your trust
thankYou.subtitle: An advisor will reach out shortly. Meanwhile explore our AI insights.
